entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 10:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight except snow inland late in the evening and after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
